questions.question: Which one of the following is a benefit of new product development?

choices.answer: It is cheaper to develop a new products
The latest technology can be a feature of the new product
Customers will always prefer newly developed products

questions.question: Which of these products is an example of a consumer good?

choices.answer: A bottle soap powder
A washing machine repair service
A drink can filling machine
The design of an advertisement for computers

questions.question: Which of these products is an example of a producer good?

choices.answer: A bottle of washing up liquid
A washing machine repair service
A drink can filling machine
The design of an advertisement for computers

questions.question: Which of these products is an example of a consumer service?

choices.answer: A bottle of washing up liquid
A washing machine repair service
A drinkcan filling machine
The design of an advertisement for computers

questions.question: The following are stages in the development of a product. Which option Is the correct order?

choices.answer: i), iii),iv), ii)
ii), iv), i), iii)
iv),ii), i), iii)
iii), iv), ii), i)

questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of a business having a well-known brand name?

choices.answer: It will not have to do any advertising.
It can charge lower prices as a result of brand recognition
It can produce low quality products and sell them
It will have good consumer recognition of its products

questions.question: The best example of brand loyalty is

choices.answer: when a consumer uses the same washing machine for many years
when a consumer keeps buying products from the same producer
is when a manufacturer uses the same name for its products

questions.question: All are important features of packaging for a breakfast cereal except that it must

choices.answer: contain important health and contents information
protect the cereal from being crushed whilst transported
be eye-catching and attract the consumers to the product
be able to be re-used by the manufacturer

questions.question: Which of the options places the stages of a typical product life cycle in the correct order?

choices.answer: Growth, maturity, decline, introduction
Introduction,maturity, growth, decline
Introduction,decline, growth, maturity
Introduction,growth, maturity, decline

questions.question: Which of the following definitions best explains the product life cycle?

choices.answer: The length of time for consumers to use up all of a product
The length of time a product stays on a market
Stages of sales that a product passes through
Length of time taken to make a new product

questions.question: Which choics is not an extension strategy that could be used to lengthen a product life cycle?

choices.answer: The launch of a new product to replace the declining one
A new design of an existing product
The sale of the product in new markets e.g. other countries
The re-launch of the product with a new advertising campaign

questions.question: Which one of the following products is likely to have the shortest product life cycle?

choices.answer: A new design of washing machine
A mathematics text book
A new hit pop music CD
A luxury branded ice-cream

questions.question: Which combination of price and promotion could be used for a product in decline?

choices.answer: Raise the price and use an expensive advertising campaign
Lower the price and tell consumers with an advertisement
Raise the price and stop all advertising of the product
Lower price & use  promotion to tell people to buy product
